game.name: Ghouls & Guardians
game.shortDescription: Ghouls & Guardians is a tower defense and strategy game with roguelite elements. Build and manage your defenses, gather resources, and fend off relentless night creatures. Each playthrough encourages creative tactics and offers a fresh, challenging experience.
